name: spinelessly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that shows a lack of determination and an unwillingness to take any risks: He spinelessly agrees to her suggestion. She believes the Government spinelessly ducked the issue of using a zero emissions fuel. See
spineless
More examplesFewer examplesYou don't have to sit back spinelessly and let things happen.Politicians yield spinelessly to the short-term interests of fishermen.The veteran broadcaster laid into MPs for spinelessly "doing what they're told".
